sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';

const Logo = ({ size = 'medium', color = 'primary' }) => {
  const dimensions = {
    small: { width: 32, height: 32 },
    medium: { width: 48, height: 48 },
    large: { width: 64, height: 64 },
    xl: { width: 96, height: 96 }
  };

  const colors = {
    primary: '#1e3a8a',
    teal: '#0d9488',
    white: '#ffffff'
  };

  const { width, height } = dimensions[size];
  const fillColor = colors[color];

  return (
    <svg
      width={width}
      height={height}
      viewBox="0 0 64 64"
      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
      className="logo"
    >
      {/* Background circle */}
      <circle
        cx="32"
        cy="32"
        r="30"
        fill={fillColor}
        fillOpacity="0.1"
        stroke={fillColor}
        strokeWidth="2"
      />
      
      {/* Peso symbol (â‚±) */}
      <g transform="translate(16, 16)">
        {/* P shape */}
        <path
          d="M4 8 L4 24 M4 8 L14 8 Q18 8 18 12 Q18 16 14 16 L4 16"
          stroke={fillColor}
          strokeWidth="2.5"
          strokeLinecap="round"
          strokeLinejoin="round"
          fill="none"
        />
        
        {/* Horizontal lines for peso symbol */}
        <line
          x1="2"
          y1="10"
          x2="12"
          y2="10"
          stroke={fillColor}
          strokeWidth="1.5"
          strokeLinecap="round"
        />
        <line
          x1="2"
          y1="14"
          x2="12"
          y2="14"
          stroke={fillColor}
          strokeWidth="1.5"
          strokeLinecap="round"
        />
      </g>
      
      {/* Eye symbol */}
      <g transform="translate(36, 36)">
        <ellipse
          cx="8"
          cy="6"
          rx="10"
          ry="6"
          fill="none"
          stroke={fillColor}
          strokeWidth="2"
        />
        <circle
          cx="8"
          cy="6"
          r="3"
          fill={fillColor}
        />
        <circle
          cx="9"
          cy="5"
          r="1"
          fill={color === 'white' ? '#1e3a8a' : 'white'}
        />
      </g>
      
      {/* Scanning lines effect */}
      <g opacity="0.6">
        <line
          x1="8"
          y1="32"
          x2="56"
          y2="32"
          stroke={fillColor}
          strokeWidth="1"
          strokeDasharray="4,2"
        />
        <line
          x1="12"
          y1="28"
          x2="52"
          y2="28"
          stroke={fillColor}
          strokeWidth="1"
          strokeDasharray="3,3"
        />
        <line
          x1="12"
          y1="36"
          x2="52"
          y2="36"
          stroke={fillColor}
          strokeWidth="1"
          strokeDasharray="3,3"
        />
      </g>
    </svg>
  );
};

export default Logo;
